title: Introduction to Prehacks
description: This will just be a quick introduction to the Prehacks event as a whole, what we have planned for the week, and a brief talk about PickHacks.

title: Introduction to Web Scraping
description: Workshop attendees will learn the basics of web scraping using the JavaScript library puppeteer. At the end of the workshop, attendees will have a json file full of data that will fuel a course ranking website.

title: Walkthrough of a Hackathon Weekend
description: Here, participants can see what an entire weekend at a hackathon looks like, from attending the opening ceremony, watching workshops, and playing games to finally submitting their projects.

title: General Q&A
description: We will be present in a call to answer any questions about Pre and PickHacks.
